name: https://barryfrost.com/2016/01/hi-peter-i-d-be-happy
author: https://petermolnar.net
content:
Hi Barry!
Thank you for the response; to be honest, I'm struggling to get contacts to the Cambridge University, and right now I have even less chance in London. I'd only try London if Cambridge fails as an option.
The main reason for Cambridge & the University is that I'd like to get some of the students involved; they could then localize the idea and spread it in their native language, which, I believe, is a barrier for the indieweb at the moment.
But if you want to do one in London, I'd be happy to co-organize that :)
